models.name: Seedream 4.0
models.description: As a new-generation image creation model, Seedream 4.0 integrates image generation and image editing capabilities into a single, unified architecture.

examples.prompt: A futuristic cityscape at sunset with flying cars
Portrait of a woman in cyberpunk style

models.name: Seed 1.6
models.description: Advanced text-to-image generation model with enhanced prompt following capabilities.

models.name: SeedEdit 3.0
models.description: Precise image editing with natural language prompts.

examples.prompt: Change the sky to a starry night

features.title: Batch Input & Output
features.description: Upload multiple reference images and generate several outputs in one go, boosting your creative workflow.

features.title: Prompt-based Editing
features.description: Create high-quality images or make precise edits with just one single sentence. Turn your words into visuals and watch them come to life.

features.title: Versatile Styles
features.description: Unlock professional styles at your fingertips. Transform images into stunning art, whether it's watercolor, cyberpunk, or anything in between.

features.title: Knowledge-driven Generation
features.description: Easily generate visually appealing and accurate educational illustrations, charts, and professional images.
